definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: break, frustrate (NH Pi. crumble; J Aram [[פְּרַר]] As. parâru, destroy;  II. shatter; Liḥy. [[והפרו]] destroy, DHM:Epigr. Denkm., No. 21, 7);—Pf. 3 ms. [[הֵפֵר]] Is 33:8 +, [[הֵפַָר]] Ge 17:14, Nu 15:31; also metaplastic from [[הֵפִיר]] Ez Eze 17:19, Ps 33:10 (Ges:§ 67 v); 2 ms. [[וְהֵפַרְדָמתּ֫ה]] 2Sa 15:34, etc., Impf. 3 ms. [[יָפֵר]] Nu 30:13 +, [[וַיָּפֶר]] Ne 4:9, etc.; also 1 S. [[אָפִיר]] Ps 89:34 (Ges:i.c.); Imv.  ms. [[הָפֵר]] 2Ch 16:3, Ps 85:5, [[הָפֵרָה]] 1Ki 15:19; Inf. abs. [[הָפֵחר]] Pr 15:22 +; cstr. [[לְהָפֵחר]] 2Sa 17:14 +, [[לְהָפֵחיר]] Zec 11:10, sf. [[לְהַפְרְכֶם]] Le 26:15 (Ges:§ 67 dd); Pt. [[מֵפֵר]] Is 44:25, Job 5:12; —

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men violating covenant with ´[[י]] Je 11:10, Je 31:32, De 31:16, De 31:20, Le 26:15, Ez Eze 44:7, Ge 17:14, Is 24:5 cf., Je 33:20.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of men breaking compact, league (with men), Is 33:8, 1Ki 15:19 = 2Ch 16:3, Ez Eze 17:15, Eze 17:16, Eze 17:18, Eze 17:19.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of destroying the [[אַחֲוָה]] between Judah and Israel Zec 11:14.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: counsel ([[עֵחָה]]) 2Sa 15:34, 2Sa 17:14, Ezr 4:5; ´[[י]] subj. Ne 4:9, Ps 33:10; of man frustrating ´[[י]]'s counsel Is 14:27, so, c. acc. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] Job 40:8; c.acc. [[מַחֲשָׁבוֹת]] in gen., of men Pr 15:22, ´[[י]] subj. Job 15:12 so, c. acc. [[זׂתוֹת]] Is 44:25.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: make vow ([[נֶדֶר]]) ineffectual, annul it Ne 30:9, 30:14 (opp. [[חֵקִים]]), v:13, also (Impf. + Inf. abs.) v:13. 16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of annulling (godly) fear Job 15:4 [[כַּסְדִּי לזׁ אָפִיר מֵעִמּוֹ]], Ps 89:34 rd. prob. [[אָסִיר]] Ol Che Bae al.; ‖ [[הָפֵר כַּעַסְ]] Ps 85:4 (rd. [[הָסֵר]] LXX Bi Che).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[וֵתָפֵר הָאֲבֵיּוֹנָה]] Ec 12:5 is dub.: De Wild al. fails (to excite [? [[וְתֻפַר]]

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: is made ineffectual]); Ewbursts (Siegf [[וְתֻפַר]]); but caper-berry not dehiscent (Post:Flora of Syr. 106 ff.); M'Lean-Dyer:Ency. Bid. 696.): Post:Letter, July 28, 1901 breaks up (by shrivelling), fig. of failing sexual power; Aq from [[פרה]] bear fruit (cf. GFM:JBL x (1891), 60); Perles:Anal. 30 [[וְתִפְרַת]].
be broken, of covenant, 3 fs. [[תֻּפַר]] Je 33:21; [[וִתֻּפַר ]] Zec 11:11; so Is 28:18 (read [[וְתֻפַר]] for [[וְכֻפַּר]], v. ´[[כ]]).

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיְפַרְפְּרֵנִי]] Job 16:12 he hath shattered me.
